wikipedia_page.main: David William George Chidgey, Baron Chidgey (born 9 July 1942 in Basingstoke) is a Liberal Democrat politician in the United Kingdom. A former Member of Parliament (MP) for Eastleigh, he now sits in the House of Lords.

response: *1942 – David Chidgey, Baron Chidgey, English engineer and politician
